## Source: ossf-package-analysis (9d1ba9bc54763d8ec8336f0edc8d5997d5fb080801556f288a4935dac06d4878)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'reqargs' @ 1.4 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
